Title: No Dwarf Left Behind
Description:
The salt levels here are off the charts! We need to find Mordigan and get him out of there. He must be dangerously dehydrated by now. 

He's only been gone a couple hours. See if you can't determine which path the grumpy old dwarf took!
ObjectivesText: Follow Mordigan Ironjaw's path through Gorloc Shore.
RewardText: You've been busy. So have I.
